sentences: Teineteist on üks kahest välistavast võimalusest.
Meil on kaks teineteist välistavat varianti.
Kas sa valisid esimest või teist teineteist varianti?
translation: one of two mutually exclusive possibilities
context: Teineteist is an Estonian word that refers to one of two mutually exclusive alternatives or choices. It represents the concept of having to select between two options where selecting one automatically excludes the other. The word is derived from 'teine' (second) and indicates a binary choice situation.
